TopicTitle: Going through the ground at the south pole

Articles.Content:
I made a plane to go to the south pole and when landing on one of the shores of the south pole, I just went through it, no colition at all, I kept falling until I hit the sea level.

Also when loading a quicksave my wings and several other parts, like landing gears or intakes would fall off

 

  • Operating System Windows 11
  • ryzen 5 3400g and 2060 RTX Gigabyte (6gb)
